parameters.name: Alignment
parameters.description: Alignment: 0 = Left 1 = Center 2 = Right 3 = Fully justified (see Remarks )

parameters.name: FlipDirection
parameters.description: 1 to flip text vertically about the selected entity, 0 to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: HorizontalMirror
parameters.description: 1 to flip text horizontally, 0 to not

parameters.name: WidthFactor
parameters.description: 6 <= Percentage by which to evenly widen each character in the text block < = 1667

parameters.name: SpaceBetweenChars
parameters.description: 1 <= Percentage of space between each character in the text block <= 10000; valid only if Alignment != 3

title: IModelDoc2.IInsertSketchText
signature:
SketchText IInsertSketchText( 
   System.Double
Ptx
,
   System.Double
Pty
,
   System.Double
Ptz
,
   System.String
Text
,
   System.Int32
Alignment
,
   System.Int32
FlipDirection
,
   System.Int32
HorizontalMirror
,
   System.Int32
WidthFactor
,
   System.Int32
SpaceBetweenChars
)

parameters.name: Alignment
parameters.description: Alignment: 0 = Left 1 = Center 2 = Right 3 = Fully justified (see Remarks )

parameters.name: FlipDirection
parameters.description: 1 to flip text vertically about the selected entity, 0 to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: HorizontalMirror
parameters.description: 1 to flip text horizontally, 0 to not

parameters.name: WidthFactor
parameters.description: 6 <= Percentage by which to evenly widen each character in the text block < = 1667

parameters.name: SpaceBetweenChars
parameters.description: 1 <= Percentage of space between each character in the text block <= 10000; valid only if Alignment != 3

remarks:
Alignment and FlipDirection are valid only when a curve, edge, or sketch segment is selected. Text appears along the selected entity. If an entity is not selected, Text appears horizontally starting at the origin.
Select
the curve, edge, or sketch segment with Mark = 1.
See the SOLIDWORKS Design user
-interface help > Sketching > Sketch Entities > Sketch Text > SketchText PropertyManager
topic for more information about this functionality.
